item.description: Update Structure Fire; INC#1055; 04:03PM; 5130 N Yarmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tiRLTy; Encino; Patient update: Four patients were transported. 45yo male (from fire unit), 80 yo female and 24yo male all with possible smoke inhalation transported in fair condition. One adult male firefighter transported with non-life threatening injury in fair condition. LAFD Arson is responding for the cause investigation in conjunction with LAPD. No further details.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; CH8; 16 17 18; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1055; 03:07PM; 5130 N Yarmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tiRLTy; Encino; KNOCKDOWN: 62 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. The fire was contained to the unit of origin. One patient (age/gender unknown) is being evaluated for injuries. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC10 BC15 BC9 CM42 E109 E203 E273 E288 E290 E293 E39 E73 E83 E88 E93 EM10 EM17 HR3 RA100 RA93 T3 T73 T88 T90 T93 UR3 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1055; 02:45PM; 5130 N Yarmouth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tiRLTy; Encino; Two story garden style with fire showing. Two additional task forces requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 5; BC10 BC15 E288 E293 E39 E83 E93 EM17 RA100 RA93 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1001; 02:40PM; 13361 N Gladstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C6J7LH; Sylmar; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 29 minutes with no injuries reported. A total of three autos and a storage shed were involved. Firefighters prevented the fire from extending to the exposed structure (ornamental vegetation only). No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1001; 02:11PM; 13361 N Gladstone Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3C6J7LH; Sylmar; A storage shed (approx 10'x10') and two autos involved in fire. The fire is extending to ornamental vegetation on an exposed building. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E298 E91 E98 RA891 RA91 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0863; 01:11PM; 1945 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ti3ZM9; Los Feliz; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving fire companies quickly extinguished the fire in 15 minutes with no injuries reported. All occupants were out of the structure. The building type is updated to a one story, single family dwelling. The fire extended and was contained to one room of the structure. No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 E12 E227 E235 E35 RA3 RA35 RA835 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0863; 12:56PM; 1945 N Berendo St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ti3ZM9; Los Feliz; Two story, single family dwelling with an outside fire (reported to be in the backyard) extending into the first floor. ; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC11 BC5 E12 E227 E235 E35 RA3 RA35 RA835 T27 T35; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - FATALITY; INC#0745; 11:44AM; Eb 118 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IyJilf; Granada Hills; Firefighters arrived on scene to a rollover collision with one patient determined deceased on scene (age/gender unknown). Any media inquires are referred to CHP Log# 1298. No further details.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E18 E290 E7 RA18 T90; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0388; 08:24AM; 3141 W 78th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3hvPhM0; Hyde Park; Firefighters arrived to a one story, single family dwelling with smoke showing. Further investigation discovered a detached garage with obvious signs of a explosion (cause unknown at this time). One person was located in the vicinity of the home with burn injuries but is not cooperating with firefighters/paramedics for evaluation. There is no active fire but crews will be overhauling the structure to ensure no smoldering hot spots remain. Building and Safety is responding for the evaluation and occupancy determination of the structure. So Cal Gas is responding to assist in the investigation. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. 9-1-1 call was received at 8:03AM. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E266 E294 E57 E66 E94 RA257 RA57 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0318; 07:34AM; 1338 S Crenshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ka23fA; Arlington Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The first alarm (36 firefighters) extinguished the fire (prior to the arrival of the additional resources) in 15 minutes. One adult patient was transported to the hospital with burn injuries (condition/age/gender unknown at this time). A primary and secondary search found no other occupants. Firefighters contained the fire to the unit of origin, defending the attached units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 E13 E203 E211 E226 E229 E26 E29 E294 E3 E68 E94 EM11 HR3 RA26 RA29 RA826 T11 T26 T29 T3 T94 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart
